trans-unit.source: Notification Hubs Localized Breaking News Tutorial for iOS
trans-unit.target: Notification Hubs Localized Breaking News Tutorial for iOS

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Service Bus Notification Hubs to send localized breaking news notifications (iOS).
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Service Bus Notification Hubs to send localized breaking news notifications (iOS).

trans-unit.source: Use Notification Hubs to send localized breaking news to iOS devices
trans-unit.target: Use Notification Hubs to send localized breaking news to iOS devices

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Windows Store C
trans-unit.target: Windows Store C

trans-unit.source: iOS
trans-unit.target: iOS

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to use the **template** feature of Azure Notification Hubs to broadcast breaking news notifications that have been localized by language and device.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to use the **template** feature of Azure Notification Hubs to broadcast breaking news notifications that have been localized by language and device.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial you start with the Windows Store app created in [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news].
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial you start with the Windows Store app created in [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news].

trans-unit.source: When complete, you will be able to register for categories you are interested in, specify a language in which to receive the notifications, and receive only push notifications for the selected categories in that language.
trans-unit.target: When complete, you will be able to register for categories you are interested in, specify a language in which to receive the notifications, and receive only push notifications for the selected categories in that language.

trans-unit.source: There are two parts to this scenario:
trans-unit.target: There are two parts to this scenario:

trans-unit.source: iOS app allows client devices to specify a language, and to subscribe to different breaking news categories;
trans-unit.target: iOS app allows client devices to specify a language, and to subscribe to different breaking news categories;

trans-unit.source: the back-end broadcasts the notifications, using the **tag** and **template** feautres of Azure Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: the back-end broadcasts the notifications, using the **tag** and **template** feautres of Azure Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: You must have already completed the [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] tutorial and have the code available, because this tutorial builds directly upon that code.
trans-unit.target: You must have already completed the [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] tutorial and have the code available, because this tutorial builds directly upon that code.

trans-unit.source: You also need Visual Studio 2012.
trans-unit.target: You also need Visual Studio 2012.

trans-unit.source: Template concepts
trans-unit.target: Template concepts

trans-unit.source: In [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] you built an app that used **tags** to subscribe to notifications for different news categories.
trans-unit.target: In [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] you built an app that used **tags** to subscribe to notifications for different news categories.

trans-unit.source: Many apps, however, target multiple markets and require localization.
trans-unit.target: Many apps, however, target multiple markets and require localization.

trans-unit.source: This means that the content of the notifications themselves have to be localized and delivered to the correct set of devices.
trans-unit.target: This means that the content of the notifications themselves have to be localized and delivered to the correct set of devices.

trans-unit.source: In this topic we will show how to use the **template** feature of Notification Hubs to easily deliver localized breaking news notifications.
trans-unit.target: In this topic we will show how to use the **template** feature of Notification Hubs to easily deliver localized breaking news notifications.

trans-unit.source: Note: one way to send localized notifications is to create multiple versions of each tag.
trans-unit.target: Note: one way to send localized notifications is to create multiple versions of each tag.

trans-unit.source: For instance, to support English, French, and Mandarin, we would need three different tags for world news: "world_en", "world_fr", and "world_ch".
trans-unit.target: For instance, to support English, French, and Mandarin, we would need three different tags for world news: "world_en", "world_fr", and "world_ch".

trans-unit.source: We would then have to send a localized version of the world news to each of these tags.
trans-unit.target: We would then have to send a localized version of the world news to each of these tags.

trans-unit.source: In this topic we use templates to avoid the proliferation of tags and the requirement of sending multiple messages.
trans-unit.target: In this topic we use templates to avoid the proliferation of tags and the requirement of sending multiple messages.

trans-unit.source: At a high level, templates are a way to specify how a specific device should receive a notification.
trans-unit.target: At a high level, templates are a way to specify how a specific device should receive a notification.

trans-unit.source: The template specifies the exact payload format by referring to properties that are part of the message sent by your app back-end.
trans-unit.target: The template specifies the exact payload format by referring to properties that are part of the message sent by your app back-end.

trans-unit.source: In our case, we will send a locale-agnostic message containing all supported languages:
trans-unit.target: In our case, we will send a locale-agnostic message containing all supported languages:

trans-unit.source: Then we will ensure that devices register with a template that refers to the correct property.
trans-unit.target: Then we will ensure that devices register with a template that refers to the correct property.

trans-unit.source: For instance, an iOS app that wants to register for French news will register the following:
trans-unit.target: For instance, an iOS app that wants to register for French news will register the following:

trans-unit.source: Templates are a very powerful feature you can learn more about in our [Notification Hubs Guidance] article.
trans-unit.target: Templates are a very powerful feature you can learn more about in our [Notification Hubs Guidance] article.

trans-unit.source: A reference for the template expression language is in our [How To: Service Bus Notification Hubs (iOS Apps)].
trans-unit.target: A reference for the template expression language is in our [How To: Service Bus Notification Hubs (iOS Apps)].

trans-unit.source: The app user interface
trans-unit.target: The app user interface

trans-unit.source: We will now modify the Breaking News app that you created in the topic [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] to send localized breaking news using templates.
trans-unit.target: We will now modify the Breaking News app that you created in the topic [Use Notification Hubs to send breaking news] to send localized breaking news using templates.

trans-unit.source: In your MainStoryboard_iPhone.storyboard, add a Segmented Control with the three languages we support: English, French, and Mandarin.
trans-unit.target: In your MainStoryboard_iPhone.storyboard, add a Segmented Control with the three languages we support: English, French, and Mandarin.

trans-unit.source: Then make sure to add an IBOutlet in your ViewController.h as shown below:
trans-unit.target: Then make sure to add an IBOutlet in your ViewController.h as shown below:

trans-unit.source: Building the iOS app
trans-unit.target: Building the iOS app

trans-unit.source: In order to adapt your client apps to receive localized messages, you have to replace your *native* registrations (i.e. registrations that do you specify a template) with template registrations.
trans-unit.target: In order to adapt your client apps to receive localized messages, you have to replace your *native* registrations (i.e. registrations that do you specify a template) with template registrations.

trans-unit.source: In your Notification.h add the *retrieveLocale* method, and modify the store and subscribe methods as shown below:
trans-unit.target: In your Notification.h add the *retrieveLocale* method, and modify the store and subscribe methods as shown below:

trans-unit.source: In your Notification.m, modify the *storeCategoriesAndSubscribe* method, by adding the locale parameter and storing it in the user defaults:
trans-unit.target: In your Notification.m, modify the *storeCategoriesAndSubscribe* method, by adding the locale parameter and storing it in the user defaults:

trans-unit.source: Then modify the *subscribe* method to include the locale:
trans-unit.target: Then modify the *subscribe* method to include the locale:

trans-unit.source: Note how we are now using the method *registerTemplateWithDeviceToken*, instead of *registerNativeWithDeviceToken*.
trans-unit.target: Note how we are now using the method *registerTemplateWithDeviceToken*, instead of *registerNativeWithDeviceToken*.

trans-unit.source: When we register for a template we have to provide the json template and also a name for the template (as our app might want to register different templates).
trans-unit.target: When we register for a template we have to provide the json template and also a name for the template (as our app might want to register different templates).

trans-unit.source: Make sure to register your categories as tags, as we want to make sure to receive the notifciations for those news.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to register your categories as tags, as we want to make sure to receive the notifciations for those news.

trans-unit.source: Finally, add a method to retrieve the locale from the user default settings:
trans-unit.target: Finally, add a method to retrieve the locale from the user default settings:

trans-unit.source: Now that we modified our Notifications class, we have to make sure that our ViewController makes use of the new UISegmentControl.
trans-unit.target: Now that we modified our Notifications class, we have to make sure that our ViewController makes use of the new UISegmentControl.

trans-unit.source: Add the following line in the *viewDidLoad* method to make sure to show the locale that is currently selected:
trans-unit.target: Add the following line in the *viewDidLoad* method to make sure to show the locale that is currently selected:

trans-unit.source: Then, in your *subscribe* method, change your call to the *storeCategoriesAndSubscribe* to the following:
trans-unit.target: Then, in your *subscribe* method, change your call to the *storeCategoriesAndSubscribe* to the following:

trans-unit.source: Finally, you have to update the *didRegisterForRemoteNotificationsWithDeviceToken* method in your AppDelegate.m, so that you can correctly refresh your registration when your app starts.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you have to update the *didRegisterForRemoteNotificationsWithDeviceToken* method in your AppDelegate.m, so that you can correctly refresh your registration when your app starts.

trans-unit.source: Change your call to the *subscribe* method of notifications with the following:
trans-unit.target: Change your call to the *subscribe* method of notifications with the following:
